item.title: How the OpenAI vs Google battle looks through the lens of Michael Porter’s ‘5 Forces’ analysis
item.description: Also: All the news and watercooler chat from Fortune.

item.title: A top global design alliance is embracing AI to ‘let designers focus more on empathy and creativity’
item.description: Many designers are increasingly warming to the idea of incorporating AI in design, says Cecilia Brenner, the managing director of Design for Good, a g...

item.title: After GOP fights about antisemitism, JD Vance rejects ‘purity tests’ and says there’s ‘more important work to do than canceling each other’
item.description: “I didn’t bring a list of conservatives to denounce or to de-platform,” Vance said during the Turning Point convention’s closing speech.

item.title: Nicki Minaj calls Trump and Vance ‘role models’ for young men in surprise appearance at Turning Point USA event
item.description: “Both of them have a very uncanny ability to be someone that you relate to.”

item.title: OpenAI sees better margins on business sales, report says
item.description: As of October, OpenAI’s compute margins reached 70%, up from 52% at the end of 2024 and double the rate in January 2024, the Information reported,
